actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1964 for the purpose of prohibiting any alien who has not been lawfully admitted into the United States for permanent residence from participating in the food stamp program.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Food Stamp Act of 1964, any alien who has not been lawfully admitted into the United States for permanent residence from participating in the food stamp program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1964 for the purpose of prohibiting any alien who has not been lawfully admitted into the United States for permanent residence from participating in the food stamp program.
